EmailTemplate.name: AMS_PCI Compliant reminder renewal EN 15
EmailTemplate.subject: PCI DSS REMINDER
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
IATA Code: {!Case.IATA_Code__c},
This is a friendly reminder that the PCI DSS Attestation of Compliance or Nil Credit Card Self-Declaration has not been received yet. If you have submitted the evidence already, please disregard this message.
We would like highlight that the submission deadline date is {!Case.CreatedDate+30}.
If you want to learn more about how to become PCI DSS compliance, please visit our web page:
http://www.iata.org/services/finance/Pages/pci-dss.aspx
Should you need any further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.org/cs.
Yours sincerely,
Agency Management International Air Transport Association -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
In order to obtain information or assistance from IATA, do not hesitate to access at any time our Customer Portal
